wikipedia_page.main: Jacob Astley, 16th Baron Hastings (13 November 1797 – 27 December 1859), known as Sir Jacob Astley, Bt, between 1817 and 1841, was a British peer and Whig politician.

response: ** Jacob Astley, 16th Baron Hastings of England (d. 1859)
*Jacob Astley, 16th Baron Hastings, 6th Baronet Astley (1797–1859) (abeyance terminated 1841; confirmed in barony 1841)
*Jacob Astley, 16th Baron Hastings (1797–1859), British MP for West Norfolk
*A daughter, Georgiana Caroline, married Jacob Astley, 16th Baron Hastings
